column2: Handling 'BaseException' means that system exits and keyboard interrupts may be mis-handled.
Handling 'BaseException' means that system exits and keyboard interrupts may be mis-handled.
Interpreting unsanitized user input as code allows a malicious user to perform arbitrary code execution.
